67th Milestone is a multi-faceted event that will host a broad spectrum of activities, striking mix of conventional and unconventional competitions and shows with something to offer to every individual. During its span of four days, it will offer a platform for artists to perform, techies to scratch their head, speed enthusiasts to get behind the wheel and fashion freaks to walk the ramp

Founded by The Hero Group, BML Munjal University (BMU) is a not-for-profit initiative offering undergraduate and post-graduate courses in management (MBA and BBA) and undergraduate courses in engineering (BTech) and commerce (BCom (Hons)). The University has been founded with the objective of transforming higher education in India by creating a world-class teaching and learning environment. The 50-acre, fully residential and co-educational university has been notified under the Haryana State Private Universities Act, 2006.

Named after the chairman and founder of the Hero Group, Brijmohan Lall Munjal, BMU is engaged in creating, preserving and imparting internationally benchmarked knowledge and skills to a diverse community of students from across the world. The Hero Group is a US$ 5 billion group which includes Hero MotoCorp – the world’s largest two-wheeler manufacturer.
BMU is mentored by Imperial College London, the 108-year old University that is currently ranked 9th in the QS World University rankings (2016-2017).
The campus is located at the 67th KM stone on NH-8, District Gurgaon, Haryana, about 50 km from New Delhi International Airport.

Having ideas is far different from applying those practically and proving oneself. 67th milestone Aerial Drone Show gives you a wonderful opportunity to showcase your talent. The program not only aims at drone technology, but the main aim is to encourage teams coming up with basic drones who need a push for further development. All the teams need to get registered themselves and carry their own multi-rotors (tri, quad, hexa and octa-copter)

“Battle Of The Bands” gives you a chance to make the crowd dance to your beats and waive to your chorus. Let the guitarist strum and the drummer beat out while the vocalist gets into the groove with the crowd. With various bands performing to make a mark, let’s see who can make the evening an unforgettable one

Express yourself through the language of dance and reflect your soul without words. Here is the platform to showcase your talent and outstand other teams with your impressive co-ordination and mind-blowing steps. Do the hip-hop or lock and pop and set the stage ablaze with your charisma.

Game is purely based on the concept of digital logics. Participants have to design the circuits in order to get required output. There will be preliminary rounds followed by finale with different difficulty levels.

BMU brings to you a unique Master Chef contest which will not only put to test your cooking skills with fire but also flameless cooking. The competition will run for three rounds with each round comprising of an elimination round. BMU Master Chef will provide the perfect platform for anyone who wants to try their hands at cooking. But mind you! The rounds are not only limited to cooking – It is open to non-culinarians too. Come and unleash your culinary potential at BMU Master Chef.

They say, an idea can change your life. But why just let it change your own life? Why not make an impact on other’s lives too. BMU Pitchers offers the perfect platform for all young entrepreneurs to make their dreams come true.

The event is about checking and challenging the scientific skills of its participants and since we are going for a planetarium like atmosphere the event would aim at making the feeling of being involved in a space and science event real and also include the fun of science by showing occasional videos and then asking questions based on what has been shown.The questions would force the participants to think deep and also think quick on their behalf as the questions will be a mixture of tough and easy yet challenging questions.

The Fashion Crave provides you with the chance to impress the audience with your style and confidence. Bring on the best dress and let your performance define the theme for its time to live your runaway dream.\nCompetition is open for both boys and girls.

A gaming event by gamers for gamers. Form teams to compete against each other and showcase your skills in front of other players. Games include DOTA 2 and Counter Strike: Global Offensive.May the best teams win!

Grappling is a hybrid sport of many traditional martial arts including wrestling, judo ,jiu-jitsu and sambo. Our first ever university fest shall be providing a rare opportunity to showcase your talent and test your skills against great fighters from all over India. It has two weight categories over and under 70 kg

Someone once said, if you give a toy to a hacker, the first thing he\'ll do is to take it apart. If you are one of them who think this way, Hackathon is the perfect event for you at 67th Milestone. This is a 48 hour event where you need to build a prototype of a product within 48 hours, involving any software and hardware requirements there may be. You may make a fully software based product or a fully hardware hased product or mix them up to your choice. More details will be available soon prior to the event.

The Line follower robot is a mobile machine that can detect and follow the line drawn on the floor. Generally, the path is predefined and can be visible like a black line on a white surface with a high contrasted colour. Participants should have to complete the paths as per rules and regulations. The judgement criteria will be on the basis of time.

9 circular rings will be placed on the ground (preferably open space), representing 9 blocks of tic tac-toe. The game will start with both the teams running towards a ring from the starting point and placing their tag (Coloured Cloth) in separate rings. They have to return back to the starting point to pass to the next person in the team to run. The final round will have hurdles to make it more challenging. Each team will be given 3 tags (cloth piece) of same colour. They have to manipulate the clothes to create the pattern to win the tic tac toe game.

Utilise your marketing skills to create demand for your product and earn revenue, with Market Madness.Participation can be either in teams or as individuals .Each participant is recyclable products, out of which they have to create a completely new products. These products will then be made available for purchase online.The team’s aim is to market their product in a way that would fetch them maximum profits.Points will be awarded to teams on the basis of marketing strategy, amount of money earned and also on the creativity of the product.

A qualification Round in which simple MCQ question will be asked on the basics of Matlab. Second round will be subjective questions and marks will be assigned on the basis of completion time of the working code. Finale will be a quizzing round with rapid fire and buzzer round.

Documenting yourself has always been a task. So why not document the complete experience around you. This is our first festival and we want you to come up with as many unique ways of capturing your experience and take us on a journey.

Think critically and articulate your thoughts effectively!!!!!!!!!! It’s not about defeating. It’s about winning!!!!! Unlike other debating events Nayavāda is an individual debating contest where participants are asked to speak either for the motion or against it. Speaking better than your opponent is not mandatory, but speaking well is, for the winner is not decided who defeats the most opponents but the one who speaks the best.

An event to cater to the dreams of people who, for a change, know the difference between Star Wars and Star Trek: The Nerds. It will have 6 fun filled events spanning over a period of 4 days ranging from gaming to coding to crosswords, from solving crimes to stopping a worldwide apocalypse, whose cumulative score will determine the final winner. With exciting activities along with these competitions including every nerd’s biggest fantasy – Dungeons Dragons, this truly will be any nerd’s paradise.

Need for speed? 3.. 2..1 and unleash!\nCome join us in the game of tactics, real time strategy, team work and daring choices. Experience the blazing sounds generating smoke and fury of the pistons, fierce speeds and burning tires to finish top at the podium, at \'Nitro Surge\'. So, come and race away against your rivals and prove your machine worthy at the 67th Milestone 2017 with Nitro Surge- a remote controlled IC engine car race.

Improvisation is everything in photography. A specific theme will presented to you on the spot and then it\'s all on you to come up with something to gawk at. Everything in your arsenal- from the most basic inanimate objects to heavy post-processing softwares are allowed. No holds barred!
A quizzing addict will absorb information from anywhere and everywhere. But the battle is to find the ultimate quiz addict.

Are you a Tech enthusiast? Are you interested in wars? If yes, just imagine! Two robots clashing with each other, destroying and rushing to win the throne. Would you like to be that winning king? Then, gear up your robots and fly the sparks. Here is a great opportunity where you can participate and win the battle.

Techniques that need to be involved (Any, maximum 2 entries of each):
1. Silhouette
2. Panorama
3. Long Exposure
A quick peek into the arena which requires you to master a specific technique and let the world know.
The Experience Centre: The photographs of the club will be portrayed in the experience center. This is where best photographs of the online contest will share the space with other masterpieces in the experience center.

Everybody is an actor until the actor walks into the room! Make your expressions worth our while! We are all set to launch our first ever inter-college theater extravaganza! So, if you are ecstatic and you think you can come up with something interesting with your acting skills, then this is the right place. \nCOME! Join the race of giving us a quintessential description of a trouper!! \n* All the teams must be prepared for a stage play.

Each participant will be given virtual amount and a list of companies to invest in. After which they will be shown videos of the various incidences/happenings of the economy that lead to the rise/fall of the Sensex/nifty. On the basis of which they will buy/sell shares accordingly. The participant with the maximum profit will win prizes.

Following the line of India\'s got talent and America\'s got talent encourages women participation in drama, dance, music, stand-up comedy, story-telling etc You have the talent, we have the platform. Women participants in team is must. Contestants will have to compete online in the first phase, out of which 15 selected participants will compete during the fest.
Creative writing competitions where participants will be asked to pen a spin-off of any famous fantasy tale, write a detective story and also an event which is not to be disclosed.

Game will be purely based on the concept of zombies and hunters which you must have seen in movies. Hunters will be hunting the zombies and zombies can also infect hunters. We will register people randomly and make the teams ourselves. There will be a round of 15 minutes for each team and the team who will be able to hunt most number of zombies will be the winner. In field each team will send five zombies except the team who is playing at that time and that team will send its two hunters who will ride on bicycle and hunt the zombies. Hunters will hunt zombies by the water guns. Zombies will wear a paper cap on which there will be circle. Hunters will have to fill the circle with colour using water guns to kill zombies. On the other hand zombies can also infect hunters. Among the zombies there will be a squeeze ball through which they can infect hunters. They will have to hit the ball five times to infect the hunter. Once a hunter is infected he has to return back and the playing team has to send their next hunters. Maximum number of hunters a team can send will be five. A referee will be there in the ground.

DJ USAI tracks are played and supported by the likes of Nicky Romero caliber, Steve Angello, David Guetta, Merk and Kremont, R3hab, Dannic, Dada Life, Blasterjaxx, Kid Massive, Danny Avila, Promise Land, Arno Cost, Daddy\'s Groove, Thomas Gold, Sunnery James and Ryan Marciano and Swanky Tunes. In October 2016 his Hypnotize release in collaboration with Crusy was published on Protocol Recordings. Recently he has performed on the stages of the Nameless Music Festival and the Halloween Festival Monsterland.

Buried under the weight of packed schedule? Done with all the bland things in life? Worry not! 67th Milestone has come up with Laughter Toll Plaza to put an end to your monotonous and dull life. The night will see Nishant Suri, Jaspreet Singh and Nitin Mandal entertaining the audience with their wit and humor. So, get ready to laugh your guts out on the night of 4th March. #67thMilestone #bmu #Laughtertollplaza #NishantSuri #JaspreetSingh#NitinMandal

Parikrma (Hindi: परिक्रमा) is a rock and roll band from Delhi, India. They have several live performances and original numbers to their name. The band was officially formed on 17 June 1991 in Delhi. The word parikrama means \'orbital revolutions\' in Sanskrit.

Being ‘good’ in today’s world doesn’t guarantee success. It isn’t enough. It is the downright crazy and bizarre ideas that makes you different from the others and an entrepreneur is just the right person to follow his idea for he has the drive to be an initiator, a challenger and definitely the person to make the “crazy ideas” into reality. MyTalk is to inculcate a culture of entrepreneurship at the university by inviting successful entrepreneurs from various fields who share their journeys, their struggles, their awe inspiring success stories as well as the essence of the entrepreneurship in today’s world.

Kunal Kapoor is an Indian actor who appears in Hindi cinema. Apart from his career in acting, he is an entrepreneur working as the Co-Founder of Ketto, his crowdfunding startup. He has appeared in films likeRang de basanti, Bachna ae Haseeno, Don 2, Dear Zindagi and many more. Ketto is Asia\'s most-visited crowdfunding platform with the largest funding community.

Co-founder at Alaavo Ventures ,Economic Times Young Leader 2014.Experience in corporate financial training, start-up consulting, building cross-asset market risk management platforms, managing analytics and risk reporting teams and client relationship management across Asia, Europe and US. His interests lie in the field of technology, education, finance, endurance sports and building communities.

A question which has vexed Indian philosophers for millennia is - कोऽहम् i.e Who am I ? Over these millennia, different schools of Indic and western thought have answered this question in remarkably diverse ways. It is our sincere hope that we through \' कोऽहम्\', provide a platform to enable this discussion to continue. In the inaugural year i.e. 2017, we are organising कोऽहम as a part of the 67th Milestone- the annual college festival of BML Munjal University.

Dr. Anirban Ganguly, the director of Dr Syama Prasad Mookerjee Research Foundation is a member of the Central Advisory Board of Education (CABE) and a visiting faculty at Banaras Hindu university. Dr Ganguly, a columnist and a keen student of philosophy, is fascinated by and tries to interpret the evolution of Bharat as a civilisational state.

Abhinav Prakash is a research scholar and an assisstant Professor in economics from JNU. His interests span the social issues, politics, history, economics and religion.He is a column writer at the Dainik Jagran.He is also the founder-member of a public discussion forum ( India first JNU) to enrich the vibrant culture of public discussion on various socio-political, economic, national and international issues.He writes regularly for the Swarajya Magazine.

An engineer turned litigator turned arguing counsel who appears before the High Court of Delhi and the Supreme Court of India,Sai has carved a niche for himself in IP litigation, Competition law, Drug regulatory laws, indirect taxation and technology laws. Sai has handled multiple high-end technology matters across industry segments.An avid writer and a prolific legal blogger ,his blog “The Demanding Mistress” is widely read by IP practitioners, law makers and policy analysts in India and abroad. Sai also writes frequently for Swarajya, IndiaFacts and the Times of Israel.

A researcher on Public Policy at ISB, Mohali. His alma mater includes GLC, Mumbai and Columbia University School of Law, New York. He\'s an immensely respected voice in the field of financial policies, maintains a blog on the same, and writes regular guest columns at various news sites.

The Senior Vice-President of Quattro global services, and a muser of the Blockchain technology. An alumni of Columbia Business School, he has an experience of about 20 years in Payments, FinTech, Telecommunications and Business Process Management domains. He has spoken in several leading industry and social forums - CII, NASSCOM, CeBIT, Tedx and other events pertaining to Payment, Business Process Management and Leadership.

Shri Sanjay Dixit is a part of the Indian Administrative Services and is currently a Secretary in the Government of Rajasthan, Command Area Development. Before joining the IAS, he was a part of the Merchant Navy. He also writes frequently in Swarajya Magazine.
An ID Card will be issued after the necessary registration fee is paid for different event/events.
